LDM R0,0
LDM R1,1
LDM R2,2
LDM R3,3
LDM R4,4
LDM R5,5
LDM R6,6
LDM R7,7
PUSH  R1	 M[0] = 1
POP  R7		 R7 = 1
LDD  R6, 4000	 R6 = 1
STD R6, 3998	 M[3998] = 1

1001000000000000
0000000000000000
1001000000100000
0000000000000100
1001000001000000
0000000000001000
1001000001100000
0000000000001100
1001000010000000
0000000000010000
1001000010100000
0000000000010100
1001000011000000
0000000000011000
1001000011100000

0000000000000000

1010000011100000	STD R7, 3998	 M[3998] = 7       the first half of ir acts as hazard detection unit
0001111100111100	hazard 


1001100001100000	LDD  R3, 3998	 R3 = 7
0001111100111100

0000000000000000

1010000001100000	STD R3, 3998	 M[3998] = 7       the first half of ir acts as hazard detection unit
0001111100111100	hazard

1000000011100000	PUSH  R7	 M[4000] = 7	SP = 3998	hazard
1000000001100000	PUSH  R3	 M[3998]=  3	SP = 3996
1000100011100000	POP  R7		 SP = 3998	R7 = 3	
0000000000000000	NOP to act as hazard detection unit
0000000000000000	because push is not working in forwarding
1000000011100000	PUSH  R7	 M[3998] = 3	SP = 3996	hazard
1001100001100000	LDD  R3, 4000	 R3 = 1
0001111101000000
1000100010100000	POP  R5		 SP = 3998	R5 = 3	
1010000010100000	STD R5, 3998	 M[3998] = 3       the first half of ir acts as hazard detection unit
0001111100111100
